chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew K. Krueger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault), a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: 25% of income earned while in prison to go toward restitution.  $50 minimum payment per month when not in custody.

No contact with females less than 18 years old without agent approval.  No contact with the victim or immediate family.  Might need family court order regarding victim's sister.  
Letter of apology within 30 days through the Victim Witness 
Office.  When on supervision agent has power to impose a No contact provision with other people to avoid problems for the defendant.  
Sex Offender Registry.  
Provide a DNA Sample.
Assessment, evaluations, and treatment programs under DOC
Fines and costs will be run concurrently with the prison sentence.

Defendant Matthew K. Krueger in court with attorney John Scott Bartholomew.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Doctor report submitted by defense.  PSI has been received and reviewed.  Doctor Stress Licensed psychologist sworn in and testifies.  Called by the defense. His Curriculum Vita marked as Exhibit #1.    Cross Exam by Atty Niemi.  Re-direct.  Excused.  Exhibit #2 letter from employer submitted.  A Mastrodanado sworn in and testifies on behalf of the defendant.  No cross exam.  AN, step father makes a statement to the Court.  AN makes a statement .  Letter from MP read by ADA Niemi.  ADA Niemi makes recommendation.  Further arguments by ADA Niemi.  Arguments by Atty Bartholomew.  Defendant makes a statement.    Citizenship, voting, and/or firearms information provided.  Court makes a statement.  45 days to determine restitution.  Judge pronounces sentence.
